hero.title: FACEIT FORECAST
hero.subtitle: Convenient extension for detailed Faceit statistics

card1.title: New Elo Ratings
card1.desc: Adds additional rating levels for more accurate representation of player skills at high ranks, expanding the standard 10-level Faceit system.

card2.title: Extended Match History
card2.desc: Quick access to match scoreboards directly from history. Displays detailed player statistics in matches, including HLTV rating, kills/deaths, KD and KR ratios, and ADR.

card3.title: Quick Position Selection
card3.desc: Set up custom messages that will be automatically sent when selecting a map in the match room.

card4.title: Team Win Rate
card4.desc: View current team win percentages in the match room to quickly assess opponent strength.

card5.title: Personal Player Statistics
card5.desc: See win percentage of each player's recent matches directly on their user card in the match.

card6.title: Multi-Browser Support
card6.desc: Available for multiple browsers including: Chrome, Firefox and Edge with consistent functionality.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: 1. Overview
section1.intro: Faceit Forecast is a browser extension that provides detailed statistics and analytics for FACEIT matches and players. Key features include:
section1.features:
• Extended Faceit levels with detailed elo breakdown
  • Enhanced match statistics and team win percentages
  • Detailed player statistics displayed on user cards
  • Specific match history statistics (Score, HLTV 2.1 rating, K/D, K/R, ADR)
  • Quick match information preview without following links
  • Automatic message sending when selecting maps
section1.policy: This policy explains how the extension processes data while providing these features.
section1.highlight: Key Point: This extension does not collect, store, or process any personal information such as names, email addresses, browsing history, passwords, or personal files.

section2.title: 2. Data We DO NOT Collect
section2.content:
• Personally identifiable information (names, email addresses, phone numbers)
  • Browser history or website visits
  • Passwords or login credentials
  • Personal files or documents
  • Location data, except that automatically included in HTTP requests

section3.title: 3. Communication with External Services
section3.intro: The extension interacts with two external services to provide its functionality:

sub1.title: 3.1. Developer Analytics Server
sub1.content:
• Service: forecast.dargen.dev
  • Purpose: Service for collecting and processing anonymous analytics, such as counting active users and monitoring online status

sub2.title: 3.2. Public FACEIT API
sub2.content:
• Service: open.faceit.com
  • Purpose: Access to public match and player statistics for analyzing and displaying game information

section4.title: 4. Automatic Technical Information
section4.intro: As with all internet connections, HTTP requests may automatically include standard technical information such as:
section4.list:
• IP address (required for internet connection)
  • Browser user-agent string
  • Basic request headers
section4.highlight: Important: This technical information may be temporarily stored in server logs for technical purposes and service reliability. It is not used to identify users and is not shared with third parties.

section5.title: 5. Local Data Storage
section5.intro: The extension may temporarily store data locally in your browser to optimize performance, including:
section5.list:
• Cached FACEIT statistics (temporary, automatically cleared)
  • Extension settings and preferences
section5.note: This data remains on your device and is not transmitted to external servers.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
section6.content:
• Removal: You can remove the extension at any time through your browser's extension management page
  • Data Clearing: Removing the extension deletes all locally stored data
  • Opt-out: Simply remove the extension to stop all data processing

section7.title: 7. Third-Party Services
section7.intro: This extension uses the public FACEIT API. Please review the FACEIT Privacy Policy for information about their data handling practices.

sub1.title: 7.1. Advertising and Partner Integrations
sub1.content: • The extension may display optional partner advertising banners to support project development. These banners do not collect any personal data, do not track users, and can be disabled at any time through the extension settings.

section8.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
section8.content: We may periodically update this privacy policy. Any changes will be reflected by updating the "Last Updated" date at the top of the page. Continued use of the extension after changes indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

section9.title: 9. Legal Basis (for EU Users)
section9.content: For users in the European Union, our legal basis for data processing is legitimate interest in providing extension functionality and anonymous usage statistics measurement.

section10.title: 10. Data Security
section10.content: While we do not collect personal data, we apply appropriate technical measures to ensure the security of any data transmissions and guarantee that the extension operates safely within your browser's security model.

section11.title: 11. Contact Information
section11.intro: If you have questions or comments about this privacy policy:
section11.response: Response Time: We strive to respond within 72 hours.

privacy.footer: <small>This privacy policy applies when using the Faceit Forecast extension.</small>
